title: azir attack clicking
body: right clicking some neutral monsters to attack creates a seemingly random attack move for azir halfway across the map, has happened on baron, dragon, blue buff and raptors for me so far.

replies.body: Should be fixed in 6.6, as Lost Frost mentioned. ^-^
Riot is aware of the bug and fixing it by next patch. Here is the latest Red comment regarding the bug: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/d55w1yzd-azir-broken?comment=0001
